title: Reaching Mastery 6 and 7 costs to much BE (Blue Essence)
body: For Mastery 6, it costs 3250 BE and around 4000 BE for Mastery 7, I know getting those mastery levels should really mean something. But at the same time, with that amount of BE I could get a new champion which can change how I play the game. Whilst getting that higher Mastery doesn't change up the game. It's only a visual.
